page.title: 16Popular Pets
page.content:
Dalhousie Street and Holyrood Street were chosen as guides to find which is the most popular pet within our area. These streets were chosen because one street has big gardens and the other has smaller gardens.It was thought that whether or not pets were kept would depend on the size of the garden.These are the results:
{DOGS CATS RABBITS 22 14 4
{GUINEA-PIGS BUDGIES FISH 6 2 168
Fish was the most popular pet perhaps because they are easy to keep and don't need to be taken for walks. More dogs were kept in the houses which have big gardens and often several dogs were kept in one of them.
